message.body: Hi: r u ready? Would like to come up to ck widows this afternoon....c u, henry
Hey, girls: u like p'kin' pie? Got some!

Hi! Err...the lights in the hallway don't seem to be working right now...have left you a flashlight on the shelf just inside the landing doorway...,the problem may self correct , or we get a new system...in meantime: enjoy cute flshlght!
Hey Henry, if you are home I can bring cookies by!
Gotta go to fu-wah to get tofu hoagie and money...back in a flash
Ok let me know when you are back!
